---

# functions Provider
The functions provider extends the available functions for a Terraform project.

## Example Usage

**versions.tf**
```terraform
terraform {
  required_version = "~> 1.8"

  required_providers {
    utilities = {
      source  = "craigsloggett/utility-functions"
      version = "0.1.0"
    }
  }
}
```

**providers.tf**
```terraform
provider "utilities" {}
```
